abstract: Procter & Gamble names group president David S Taylor as next chief executive; move follows major corporate restructuring under which company has vigorously slimmed down; will replace A G Lafley.
lead_paragraph: David S. Taylor, a group president who joined P.&G. in 1980, takes charge of a company that has spent months vigorously slimming down.

headline.main: A Smaller P.&G. Sets Its Next Leader
headline.print_headline: A Smaller P.&G. Sets Its Next Leader

snippet: David S. Taylor, a group president who joined P.&G. in 1980, takes charge of a company that has spent months vigorously slimming down.
